title: Audio Book Schema
description: The Audio Book Archetype - Essential properties that define an audio book

_id.description: Unique identifier for this archetype record

draft.description: Indicates this archetype record is a draft and is not published

created.description: Date and time this archetype record was created in ISO 8601 date standard e.g. YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD

updated.description: Date and time this archetype record was updated in ISO 8601 date standard e.g. YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD

primary_audio_archetype.description: Audio Archetype ID to use as the primary audio file of this audio book

primary_image_archetype.description: Image Archetype ID to use as the primary image of this audio book

price.description: Audio book price in cents as an integer (whole number)

series.description: The series the audio book belongs to

publication_date.description: Date and time the audio book was published in ISO 8601 date standard e.g. YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD

duration.description: Timed duration of the audio book

publisher.description: The publiser of the audio book

category.description: General category of the audio book, e.g. Sci-Fi & Fantasy

subcategory.description: Specific category of the audio book, e.g. Fantasy - Epic

tags.description: Array of Tag Archetypes that are used to help categorize this Archetype record
